> ::Lord Elder::
>
>=A0Elder watches at Darkfate's shots hit the shuttle, c=
auseing some damage but
>=A0nothing serious.
Legacy paused for a moment as =
he noted Nightstrike's recovery and the appearance of a second minion: Dark=
fate. As Nightstrike's attacks further drained his shielding his shielding =
finally failed, and the minion's attack burned into his armor, causing mino=
r damage! 
=A0
>=A0Elder: Suggestions? They are ehading towards Atlantis bu=
t we must also complete
>=A0the Matrix Quest and find out about the situati=
on at the Black Fortress.
"ACCORDING TO HISTORICAL RECORD" Legacy stated af=
ter a pause, "CYCLONUS IS CURRENTLY DIRECTING HIS FLEET OF SWEEPS AGAINST T=
HE BLACK FORTRESS AS SCOURGE SOUGHT OUT THE CORRUPTED RODIMUS PRIME. ONCE T=
HE MINIONS REJOINED CYCLONUS, AND WITH THE POWER OF THE THEN=A0STOLEN SECON=
D MATRIX THEY OVERWHELMED THE DEFENDERS THERE. I HAVE NO RECORD OF ANY EVEN=
TS IN ATLANTIS FOR THE NEXT SEVERAL EARTH DAYS, THESE ARE NEW EVENTS."
Lega=
cy quickly shifted form, assuming not his robot mode but his third form, th=
at of a weapon's platform, or perhaps a satalite. In either case it was fli=
ght capable and manuverable. With the solar power he had been absorbing, he=
 could once again utilize it. He rose swiftly into the air as he directed h=
is cannons at Darkfate and firing!
"MY SUGGESTION" Legacy continued, "WOULD=
 BE TO DESTROY THE MINIONS AT ALL COSTS, STARTING WITH THIER MILITARY HEAD =
CYCLONUS! IF HE IS NUETRALIZED THIS SET OF EVENTS WILL HALTED"
Preston
(Leg=
acy)
